request.subject: COS 330
request.description: I am having trouble with the assignment. Please help me.

messages.message: Good day Julianna. I will be able to help you with the assignment. Could you please send me the question and the problem you are having?
Thank you, I am struggling with question 2. I think there might be a problem with the question as it makes no sense to me. Could you please clarify the question for me?
I see what you are saying about the question. I will speak to the lecturer and get back to you as soon as possible.
Thank you, looking forward to hearing from you.
